title: Sausage, apple and cranberry stuffing
ingredients: ['75g (3 oz) cubed wholemeal bread', '150g (5 oz) cubed white bread', '500g (1 1/4 lb) sausages, casings removed and chopped', '1 medium onion, chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '2 1/2 teaspoons dried sage', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried rosemary', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 Golden Delicious apple, cored and chopped', '100g (4 oz) dried cranberries', '1 small bunch fresh parsley, minced', '1 cooked turkey liver, finely chopped', '175ml (6 fl oz) turkey stock', '50g (2 oz) unsalted butter, melted']
